detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Round hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Buttons at the back, short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lining in a cotton weave.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in soft, pattern-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Polo-neck collar knitted in a cashmere blend.
Polo-neck collar knitted in a cashmere blend.

Suit trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Double-breasted jacket in sturdy bouclé made from a cotton blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Fitted body in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck, long sleeves and lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Metal rings in various designs, one with a faceted plastic bead.
Metal rings in various designs, one with a faceted plastic bead.
Knee-length dress in a rib knit containing glittery threads with a V-neck, detachable tie belt under the bust, and long sleeves.
Rings in antiqued metal in various designs. One smooth, one with a textured finish and three with an embossed pattern.
Polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Pyjama top and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. Low-cut top with short sleeves, gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a practical, lace-trimmed inner top for easier nursing access. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist that can be adjusted as the tummy grows.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
High-waisted shorts in bouclé made from a cotton blend with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Trousers in a soft weave with a high waist and concealed zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Detachable tie belt, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Fitted top in sturdy jersey with a sweetheart neckline, and 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathers and elastication around the shoulders for extra volume.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses with no magnification.

Shirt in a woven, stretch cotton blend with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in a woven, stretch cotton blend with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short skirt in velour with a sheen. High waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in, frill-trimmed wrapover at the front. Unlined.

Short dress in stretch, denim-look jersey with a round neckline, yoke at the front and a visible zip at the back. Long, wide, cuffed puff sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
